# ADR-005: Add Container/Packaging Distributor Support for Invoice Processing

**Status:** Accepted
**Date:** 2025-12-20
**Source:** init (auto-generated from git history)

## Context
The invoice parsing system needed to handle distributor-specific invoice formats from container and packaging suppliers.

## Decision
Extended the invoice parsing capabilities to support container and packaging distributor invoice formats.

## Rationale
Supporting industry-specific invoice formats improves data accuracy and reduces manual processing overhead for kitchen operations.

## Alternatives Considered
Manual processing of these invoices or generic parsing approaches were considered.

## Consequences
- **Positive:** Improved automation coverage for supply chain invoice processing in commercial kitchens.
- **Negative:** Increased complexity in invoice parsing logic and maintenance overhead for distributor-specific formats.
